question_text: Which statements are true about cloning a laptopâ€™s drive to an SSD?
answer_options: You can clone while the system is running using live imaging software
You must remove the old drive before starting the imaging process
Some SSDs include free cloning tools
You can create an image to an external drive, then restore to a new SSD
correct_answer: You can clone while the system is running using live imaging software
Some SSDs include free cloning tools
You can create an image to an external drive, then restore to a new SSD
explanation: Cloning can be done live or cold. Many SSD vendors provide tools, and backups can be used for later restore.
